name: Clash of Penguins
description:
Clash of Penguins !

4 Penguins, 1 drift ice who's falling appart : who'll be the last one standing ?

Clash of Penguins ! is a 4-players party game where you have to survive to the falling ice. 

Each one of your moves will break a piece of the ice ground , find your way to cut le floor of your opponents and be the last one standing ! 

Install instructions 

Download, extract files and play. You need 4 Xbox controller to play whit 4 players.

*This game was made (whit love) in one week by a team of two student at the 168h game jam of Lisaa Game school.*
